item.description:
NE Patriot Summer Training Camp
We are heading out for the morning training this year. The last 3x the afternoon training has been uncomfortably sweltering - I don't know how the Pats do it!

This is a serious NO MISS!!
Come see the NE Patriots practice at Gillette. Maybe we can even snag an autograph! The Pats practice from 9:30-11:15am and your admission is FREE.

Following our Summer Training Camp viewing and autograph session, we will head for lunch and/or the beach!

Rain: cancellation only if practice is canceled. Summer Camp hotline for updates 508-549-0001.

Were to meet: Enter the P6 entrance and head for parking around the back of Gillett Stadium. This is opposite of the North Retail Center where CBS is. The entrance is by the concessions, which will be open. You'll also not doubt see a crowd.

The bleachers hold 3,000 people and another 2,000 on the lawn so I will probably head there early to secure a place in line. Depending on crowd size either look for me on line or call me 508-415-0590.

Please try to be on time so we can all enjoy the event.
item.name: NE Patriots Summer Training Camp
